Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 285-1 Filed 05/20/21 Page 3 of 10
2
- US Attorney has said could be prosecuted elsewhere
Agnt. under 2255 if victim elect to proceed [under 2255 + forfeit crt] remedies Epstein must pay stat. min. 50K or 150K. At least 12 proceeded under that provision
Named
Ghislain Maxwell - daughter of Robert Maxwell - head recruiter
- Evidence = 2000 (Virginia Roberts - her Case unclear at time)
- NO END
CONFIDENTIAL
